text_block_list.text: Looking for further improvements, we'd come to the summer camp. Maruzensky rose in good spirits on the final day.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Morning, trainer. Ready up! We've got another day of training ahead!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Morning, trainer. Ready up! We've got another day of training ahead!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: The last one. Let's smash it out the park!
With a spirited Maruzensky, I wholeheartedly faced the last day.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew… Good job, trainer! Hmhm, we're both dripping with sweat huh—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew… Good job, trainer! Hmhm, we're both dripping with sweat huh—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'm exhausted, but I feel so good, fulfilled perhaps!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I truly feel like we accomplished something in training. The next race should be fun. Ehehe, you'll have something to look forward to.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But… trainer, are you okay? Aren't you exhausted from standing out in the hot sun all day?
choice_data_list: I'll be fine with some rest.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But… trainer, are you okay? Aren't you exhausted from standing out in the hot sun all day?
choice_data_list: I'll be fine with some rest.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Really? Don't push yourself, okay?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well then, let's go home and freshen up. We need to get a good rest after all that work!
We returned to our lodgings and took a bath. When I went to take in the night breeze afterwards—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: "I'll be fine with some rest"… But I'm sure trainer's tired… Am I pushing too hard?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, trainer.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, trainer.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Umm… the younger kids told me that a nearby shrine's holding a festival right now.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …Yep, I'm asking you to come with!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: How about having dinner at one of the festival stalls!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I heard there are stalls with games, and they're having a Bon dance too. I bet we'd have a great time together!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahah, fabulous!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: All right! Now that's decided, let's get our groove on at that Bon dance!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come, come, trainer! Over here!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come, come, trainer! Over here!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wow! Of course it's packed with people. There's a stall that piqued my interest, but can we even find it?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Eheheh♪ It's not just any food stall, okay? Get this…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: They sell the hippest and raddest sweets!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: One's called the "Carrot DX Tower Parfait". They only sell it in summer and it's a very popular treat with horsegirls.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm a little worried they'll sell out, but I'd rather save the sweets stands for later, you know?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: We should start with—
（Pon-poro-pon-poro～♪)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: —this! The Bon dance! I danced my heart out to this with my family as a child… where are the times.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Right on! Get down and boogie with me!
I joined in the Bon dancing crowd with Maruzensky. She moved like second nature and that didn't go unnoticed by the other dancers—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whoo! I could dance all night～! Come on, trainer! Are you jivin'～?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whoo! I could dance all night～! Come on, trainer! Are you jivin'～?!
At some point I think we started dancing something quite different from a "Bon" dance, everybody was so into it……

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Mmmmmm～! I had a blast! So did you it seems, trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Mmmmmm～! I had a blast! So did you it seems, trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Right? Everyone was grooving! I even got up on the platform in my excitement♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: When I stood near the drums I could feel the beat run through me! It was an absolute fry!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I often heard it from my mom; "The platform has you vibin'!". Eheh, like daughter, like mother, right?
choice_data_list: I see. So your mother's to blame…
I see. So your mother's to blame…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Did you say something?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hey, never mind that, let's go find those sweets!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Here I come, Carrot DX Tower Parfait!
After buying a "Carrot DX Tower Parfait" and enjoying the other food stalls, we headed back to the camp lodgings.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: The parfait was amazing～! The macarons on top were filled with ice cream… My tummy and my heart are both sated♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Running around the beach, dancing at the Bon, eating the hippest sweets…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I never thought I'd be spending times like these with someone～

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It was a lot of fun. Will you accompany me again in the future?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Traaaiiner, are you sure you want to answer without a second thought～?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Traaaiiner, are you sure you want to answer without a second thought～?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'll drag you along with my whims and fancies. To all sorts of places, doing all sorts of things～

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hmhm, I know you're tired… But okay! I'll have to have a good think about our next outing!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …It's really strange, though. I feel so much more free with you than when I'm alone.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …It's really curious, though. I feel so much more free with you than when I'm alone.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can go anywhere, I can run, I can do anything. Trainer, you make me feel that way.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can go anywhere, I can run, I can do anything. Trainer, you make me feel that way.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: And that's… You're so fun to be around, trainer!
choice_data_list: I enjoy my time with you too.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can't believe…  Being with you's so much fun, Trainer!
choice_data_list: Being with you is great too.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My! So we have a mutual relationship♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It's a little embarrassing to say again, but… I hope we can continue to share the fun together.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: A horsegirl and her trainer… in perfect harmony. Treat me well, trainer… partner!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: A horsegirl and her trainer… in perfect harmony. Treat me well, trainer… partner!
